description:
Looking for someone with a background in Unity game development and artificial intelligence/machine learning.

You must have experience using Unity machine learning agents and know how to do deep reinforcement learning.

Context: https://unity.com/products/machine-learning-agents

You can produce the following example and record your screen when working on it:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=v3UBlEJDXR0

- level design
